result.markdown:
## Regressão linear


::: {.cell hash='Aula_8.1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_22a0c6665e9caea5a7ff423b40c10812'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(gsheet)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
library(lme4)
library(r4pde)
library(broom)
library(car)
library(patchwork)
estande <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bq2N19DcZdtax2fQW9OHSGMR0X2__Z9T/edit#gid=401662555")
```
:::


## Vizualizando


::: {.cell hash='Aula_8.1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_fb8138cfa71229b8c5ade320d42b0dbc'}

```{.r .cell-code}
 estande |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, nplants))+
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1, alpha = 0.2)+
  #facet_wrap(~ exp)+
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_cl_boot", color = 'black', alpha = 0.5)+
  theme_few()+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = F)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula_8.1_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='Aula_8.1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_e130b959d7338a45565ccaa69e12d405'}

```{.r .cell-code}
exp1 = estande |> 
  filter(exp == 1)

exp1 |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, nplants))+
  geom_point()+
  theme_few()+
  ylim(0,100)+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = F)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula_8.1_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Modelo linear

lm1 <- lm(nplants ~ trat, data = exp1)

summary(lm1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = nplants ~ trat, data = exp1)

Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-25.500  -6.532   1.758   8.573  27.226 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)  52.5000     4.2044  12.487 1.84e-11 ***
trat         -0.2419     0.1859  -1.301    0.207    
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 15 on 22 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.07148,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.02928 
F-statistic: 1.694 on 1 and 22 DF,  p-value: 0.2066
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='Aula_8.1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_8db3aed8162fc804173df68aead5b47e'}

```{.r .cell-code}
exp2 = estande |> 
  filter(exp == 2)

exp2 |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, nplants))+
  geom_point()+
  theme_few()+
  ylim(0,100)+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = F)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula_8.1_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Modelo linear

lm2 <- lm(nplants ~ trat, data = exp2)

summary(lm2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = nplants ~ trat, data = exp2)

Residuals:
     Min       1Q   Median       3Q      Max 
-25.7816  -7.7150   0.5653   8.1929  19.2184 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)  60.9857     3.6304  16.798 4.93e-14 ***
trat         -0.7007     0.1605  -4.365 0.000247 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 12.95 on 22 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.4641,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.4398 
F-statistic: 19.05 on 1 and 22 DF,  p-value: 0.0002473
```

::: {.cell hash='Aula_8.1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_030ecfd095aa0cbb48d4aa2149432beb'}

```{.r .cell-code}
exp3 = estande |> 
  filter(exp == 3)

exp3 |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, nplants))+
  geom_point()+
  theme_few()+
  ylim(0,100)+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = F)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'
```
:::

```
(`stat_smooth()`).
```

```

(`geom_point()`).
```
:::

![](Aula_8.1_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Modelo linear

lm3 <- lm(nplants ~ trat, data = exp3)

summary(lm3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = nplants ~ trat, data = exp3)

Residuals:
     Min       1Q   Median       3Q      Max 
-26.5887  -3.9597   0.7177   5.5806  19.8952 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)  95.7500     2.9529  32.425  < 2e-16 ***
trat         -0.7634     0.1306  -5.847 6.97e-06 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 10.53 on 22 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.6085,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.5907 
F-statistic: 34.19 on 1 and 22 DF,  p-value: 6.968e-06
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
residuals(lm3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
          1           2           3           4           5           6 
  5.2500000  -1.7500000  -2.7500000   9.2500000  -0.4596774   3.5403226 
          7           8           9          10          11          12 
  2.5403226  15.5403226   7.8306452   3.8306452 -17.1693548  -2.1693548 
         13          14          15          16          17          18 
 12.4112903  -7.5887097  -2.5887097 -26.5887097 -10.4274194  -9.4274194 
         19          20          21          22          23          24 
  3.5725806   6.5725806 -10.1048387  19.8951613   1.8951613  -1.1048387 
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
hist(residuals(lm3))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula_8.1_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-2.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='Aula_8.1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_0b06741e87416e5ddfdf65f897e92205'}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Modelo linear generalizado
glm3 <- glm(nplants ~ trat,
            family = gaussian,
            data = exp3)

summary(glm3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
glm(formula = nplants ~ trat, family = gaussian, data = exp3)

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)  95.7500     2.9529  32.425  < 2e-16 ***
trat         -0.7634     0.1306  -5.847 6.97e-06 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

(Dispersion parameter for gaussian family taken to be 110.9787)

    Null deviance: 6235.8  on 23  degrees of freedom
Residual deviance: 2441.5  on 22  degrees of freedom
AIC: 185.04

Number of Fisher Scoring iterations: 2
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
AIC(glm3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 185.0449
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
glm3b <- glm(nplants ~ trat,
             family = poisson(link = "log"),
             data = exp3)

summary(glm3b)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
glm(formula = nplants ~ trat, family = poisson(link = "log"), 
    data = exp3)

Coefficients:
             Estimate Std. Error z value Pr(>|z|)    
(Intercept)  4.571590   0.029539 154.762  < 2e-16 ***
trat        -0.009965   0.001488  -6.697 2.13e-11 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

(Dispersion parameter for poisson family taken to be 1)

    Null deviance: 77.906  on 23  degrees of freedom
Residual deviance: 29.952  on 22  degrees of freedom
AIC: 183.93

Number of Fisher Scoring iterations: 4
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
AIC(glm3b) # 	Akaike's An Information Criterion (O Critério de Informação de Akaike": quanto menor, melhor)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 183.9324
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Modelos Lineares Generalizados de Efeitos Mistos

glmer3 <- glmer(nplants ~ trat + (trat | exp), family = gaussian, data = estande)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning in glmer(nplants ~ trat + (trat | exp), family = gaussian, data =
estande): calling glmer() with family=gaussian (identity link) as a shortcut to
lmer() is deprecated; please call lmer() directly
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning in checkConv(attr(opt, "derivs"), opt$par, ctrl = control$checkConv, :
Model failed to converge with max|grad| = 0.00274249 (tol = 0.002, component 1)
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
summary(glmer3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

   Data: estande

            Estimate Std. Error t value

trat         -0.5687     0.1643  -3.462

     (Intr)
trat -0.731
optimizer (nloptwrap) convergence code: 0 (OK)
Model failed to converge with max|grad| = 0.00274249 (tol = 0.002, component 1)
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
AIC(glmer3)
```

```
[1] 592.8402
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
glmer3b <- glmer(nplants ~ trat + (trat|exp), family = poisson(link = "log"),
                                                              data = estande) 

summary(glmer3b)
```

```{.r .cell-code}
fit_all <- wm |> 
  group_by(study) |> 
  do(tidy(lm(.$yld ~ .$inc), conf.int = TRUE))

fit_all
```

```{.r .cell-code}
g_inter <- fit_all |> 
  filter(term == "(Intercept)") |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = estimate))+
  theme_r4pde()+
  geom_histogram(bins = 8, color = "white", fill = "gray50")+
  labs(x = "Intercept", y = "frequency")

g_slop <- fit_all |> 
  filter(term == ".$inc") |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = estimate))+
  theme_r4pde()+
  geom_histogram(bins = 8, color = "white", fill = "gray50")+
  labs(x = "Slopes", y = "Frequency")


g_inter + g_slop
```

![](Aula_8.1_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
df <- fit_all |>
  filter(term == ".$inc")

mean(df$estimate)
```

```{.r .cell-code}
  geom_point()+

   ggplot(aes(Assess, ImageJ))+
   geom_point()+

   ggplot(aes(ImageJ, LeafDoctor))+

   geom_smooth(method = "lm")
```

## Pós-intervalo


::: {.cell hash='Aula_8.1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-17_e86757a0852af2e2d18711f1a8b55536'}

```{.r .cell-code}
campo |> 
  ggplot(aes(DFC, PROD))+
  geom_jitter()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula_8.1_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-17-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='Aula_8.1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-18_800eb4fc89852bb902c2fd9d47ed9349'}

```{.r .cell-code}
estande <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bq2N19DcZdtax2fQW9OHSGMR0X2__Z9T/edit#gid=401662555")

exp2 <- estande |> filter(exp == 2)

exp2 |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, nplants))+
  geom_point()+
  theme_few()+
  ylim(0, 100)+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm",
              se = F,
              formula = y~poly(x,2),
              color = "red")+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula_8.1_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-18-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#Modelo de primeira ordem
lm2 <- lm(nplants~trat,
          data = exp2)

summary(lm2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = nplants ~ trat, data = exp2)

Residuals:
     Min       1Q   Median       3Q      Max 
-25.7816  -7.7150   0.5653   8.1929  19.2184 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)  60.9857     3.6304  16.798 4.93e-14 ***
trat         -0.7007     0.1605  -4.365 0.000247 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 12.95 on 22 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.4641,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.4398 
F-statistic: 19.05 on 1 and 22 DF,  p-value: 0.0002473
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
hist(residuals(lm2))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula_8.1_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-18-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Modelo de segunda ordem ou modelo quadrático (ainda é um modelo liner, é um modelo curvelinear)
exp2$trat2 <- exp2$trat^2

lm3 <- lm(nplants~trat + trat2,
          data = exp2)

summary(lm3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = nplants ~ trat + trat2, data = exp2)

Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-25.439  -6.019   1.789   8.016  19.561 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept) 66.30156    4.42097  14.997 1.08e-12 ***
trat        -1.77720    0.58467  -3.040  0.00623 ** 
trat2        0.02223    0.01166   1.906  0.07036 .  
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 12.24 on 21 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.5432,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.4997 
F-statistic: 12.49 on 2 and 21 DF,  p-value: 0.0002675
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
hist(residuals(lm3))
```

![](Aula_8.1_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-18-3.png){width=672}

## Modelo não linear


::: {.cell hash='Aula_8.1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-19_714f927686c2357c744d00e61de1250c'}

```{.r .cell-code}
sensi <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bq2N19DcZdtax2fQW9OHSGMR0X2__Z9T/edit#gid=465348652")

sensi$dose <- as.factor(sensi$dose)

is.factor(sensi$dose)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] TRUE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
sensi|> 
  group_by(code, dose) |> 
  summarise(mean_germination = mean(germination)) |>  
  ggplot(aes(dose, mean_germination))+
  geom_point()+
  facet_wrap(~code)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'code'. You can override using the
`.groups` argument.
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula_8.1_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-19-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='Aula_8.1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-20_e7767ede37f66bdcad861dc28e1578ff'}

```{.r .cell-code}
sensi2 <- sensi|> 
  group_by(code, dose) |> 
  summarise(mean_germination = mean(germination))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'code'. You can override using the
`.groups` argument.
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
FGT05 <- sensi2 |> 
  filter(code == "FGT05")
 

library(drc)

#drc1 <- drm(mean_germination ~ dose, data = FGT05, fct = LL.3())
```
:::
